record.title: EXECUTIVE SESSION

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate proceed to executive session to consider the nomination of Ryan C. Crocker to be Ambassador to Iraq. This was reported out of the Foreign Relations Committee earlier today. I ask unanimous consent that the nomination be confirmed, a motion to reconsider be laid upon the table, that any statements be printed at the appropriate place in the Record, the President be immediately notified of the Senate's action, and that the Senate return to legislative session.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
